sqls.sql: SELECT UNIQUE_CODE FROM TX_USER where OPENID = :OPENID
select UNIQUE_CODE, SUMMARY 订单, TOTAL_AMT 金额, STATUS 状态, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') 创建时间 from TX_ORDER order by CREATE_TIME desc where USER_UC = :USER_UC
select p.name as 产品名称, oi.PRODUCT_COUNT as 数量, oi.TOTAL_AMT as 金额 from TX_ORDER_ITEM oi left join TX_PRODUCT p on oi.PRODUCT_UC = p.UNIQUE_CODE where oi.ORDER_UC = :ORDER_UC
SELECT UNIQUE_CODE ,NAME as 名称,PRICE as 单价, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') 创建时间 FROM TX_PRODUCT
